column4: i am having problems getting both 2d and 3d graphics is run at a decent speed can anyone help me
I believe that had support dropped recently in 9.04, the open source drivers can be hit or miss with ATI cards around that time.
the open source driver, or "VESA" is the only thing you can do with the x600. THe proprietary driver has to use an old X org version, which isn't easy to install on 9.04
